headline: Keybanc bearish on Lam Reaserch, positive on Applied Material
summary: Investing.com -- KeyBanc analysts cut their rating on Lam Research and turned more positive on Applied Materials, saying the sharp run-up in Lam’s shares has outpaced its near-term earnings potential while Applied offers a cheaper entry into the same industry tailwinds.

headline: Here is What to Know Beyond Why Applied Materials, Inc. (AMAT) is a Trending Stock
summary: Recently, Zacks.com users have been paying close attention to Applied Materials (AMAT). This makes it worthwhile to examine what the stock has in store.

headline: This Week In Energy Transition - Battery Storage Powers Forward With Project Alamo City
summary: OCI Energy has secured construction financing for Project Alamo City, a significant battery energy storage system in Texas, marking a notable development in the energy transition sector. The project, supported by ING's construction-to-term loan and related financing solutions, is set to enhance grid stability with a capacity of 120 MW and a 4-hour duration. This development underscores the growing importance of collaborative and innovative financing mechanisms in advancing clean energy...

headline: Is Applied Materials’ Surge Justified After US Chip Investment News in 2025?
summary: If you are weighing your next move on Applied Materials, you are not alone. The stock has been on quite a ride lately, climbing an impressive 17.3% in just the past week and soaring 23.4% over the last month. Long-term investors have seen substantial rewards too, with the stock up 148.5% in three years and an eye-opening 253.1% over five years. Even year-to-date, shares are up 22.4%, handily outpacing broader market averages. Much of this momentum reflects renewed optimism about the...

headline: Stock Index Futures Muted Ahead of U.S. PMI Data and Powell’s Speech
summary: December S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESZ25) are down -0.04%, and December Nasdaq 100 E-Mini futures (NQZ25) are down -0.06% this morning as investors remain on the sidelines ahead of a speech from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell and U.S. business activity data.

headline: Heard on the Street Tuesday Recap: Even Tylenol Can’t Cool This AI Fever
summary: Nvidia bet on OpenAI. The chip giant will invest up to $100 billion, allowing OpenAI to build data centers using Nvidia systems to train and run its next-generation models. Nvidia's shares rose 4%, adding nearly $170 billion to its market capitalization.

headline: Applied Materials (AMAT) in Focus: Morgan Stanley Hikes Price Target to $209
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is one of the AI Stocks in Focus on Wall Street. On September 22, Morgan Stanley analyst Shane Brett upgraded the stock from Equal Weight to Overweight with a price target of $209.00 (from $172.00).
